content:
Sure, here are some potential SILO topics that could be support pages for a main Defects Liability Period page, along with their target search phrases:

| SILO Topic | Target Search Phrase |
| --- | --- |
| Understanding the Contract | Building contract terms and conditions |
| Defining Practical Completion | What is practical completion in building contracts? |
| Types of Defects | Common construction defects |
| Identifying and Reporting Defects | How to report defects in a building project |
| Remedying Defects | How to rectify building defects |
| Legal Considerations | Building contract law and defects liability |
| Warranty Periods | Understanding warranty periods in building contracts |
| Post-Defect Liability Period Options | Post-defect liability period maintenance and repair options |
| Dispute Resolution | Resolving disputes related to defects liability period in building contracts |

These topics are not exhaustive and other relevant subtopics may exist based on the particular needs of the audience.
